description.zh-cn: 指中国国民党主政的中华民国政府在台湾进行政治肃清的时期，期间通过公权力迫害持不同政见者，塑造恐怖统治氛围。
description.en: A period of political purges in Taiwan under the Kuomintang-led government of the Republic of China, which used state power to persecute dissidents and create an atmosphere of terror.

en: Government of the Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 台湾白色恐怖时期的执政当局。
description.en: The ruling authority during Taiwan's White Terror period.

description.zh-cn: 台湾白色恐怖时期的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party during Taiwan's White Terror period.

description.zh-cn: 台湾白色恐怖时期的主要情治单位之一，负责执行戒严、镇压异议人士。
description.en: One of the main intelligence agencies during the White Terror period, responsible for enforcing martial law and suppressing dissidents.

nodes.id: 国民政府军事委员会调查统计局

zh-cn: 国民政府军事委员会调查统计局
en: Investigation and Statistics Bureau of the National Military Council

description.zh-cn: 台湾白色恐怖时期的主要情治单位之一。
description.en: One of the main intelligence agencies during the White Terror period.

description.zh-cn: 由时任台湾省政府主席陈诚颁布，宣告在台湾全境实施戒严，是白色恐怖时期的开端。
description.en: Proclaimed by then-Taiwan Provincial Governor Chen Cheng, it declared martial law throughout Taiwan, marking the beginning of the White Terror period.

en: Act for the Punishment of Rebellion

description.zh-cn: 白色恐怖时期的“特别刑法”，扩张了犯罪构成要件，成为政府整肃异己的法律工具。
description.en: A "special criminal law" during the White Terror period that expanded the elements of crime, becoming a legal tool for the government to purge dissidents.

nodes.id: 戡乱时期检肃匪谍条例

zh-cn: 戡乱时期检肃匪谍条例
动员戡乱时期检肃匪谍条例
en: Statute for the Purge of Spies during the Period of National Mobilization for the Suppression of Communist Rebellion

description.zh-cn: 白色恐怖时期的法律之一，废止时间被视为白色恐怖时期的结束点之一。
description.en: One of the laws during the White Terror period; its abolition is considered one of the end points of the period.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事及政治人物，时任台湾省政府主席兼台湾省警备总司令，颁布了《台湾省戒严令》。
description.en: A military and political figure of the Republic of China, who, as Governor of Taiwan Province and Commander of the Taiwan Garrison Command, proclaimed the Taiwan Province Martial Law Order.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的最高立法机关。
description.en: The highest legislative body of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 时任中华民国总统，在白色恐怖时期拥有对政治案件的最终核覆权，时常加重刑期。
description.en: Then-President of the Republic of China, who held final review power over political cases during the White Terror period and often increased sentences.

description.zh-cn: 发生于台东泰源监狱的政治犯武装起义事件，参与者多为台湾独立运动人士。
description.en: An armed uprising of political prisoners at Taiyuan Prison in Taitung, primarily involving Taiwan independence movement activists.

description.zh-cn: 泰源事件的参与者之一，后被枪决。
description.en: One of the participants in the Taiyuan Incident, later executed.

description.zh-cn: 泰源事件的参与者之一，后被枪决。
description.en: One of the participants in the Taiyuan Incident, later executed.

description.zh-cn: 泰源事件的参与者之一，后被枪决。
description.en: One of the participants in the Taiyuan Incident, later executed.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜战争的爆发导致美国派遣第七舰队巡防台海，间接巩固了国民党在台湾的统治，并促使其对内采取更高压的政策。
description.en: The outbreak of the Korean War led the US to dispatch the Seventh Fleet to patrol the Taiwan Strait, indirectly consolidating KMT rule in Taiwan and prompting it to adopt more repressive domestic policies.

description.zh-cn: 美国的“红色恐慌”浪潮，与台湾的白色恐怖在反共意识形态上相呼应。
description.en: The "Red Scare" wave in the United States, which ideologically aligned with Taiwan's White Terror in its anti-communist stance.

description.zh-cn: 因一份共产党刊物《光明报》曝光而引发的大规模搜捕事件，导致中共在台组织面临第一次瓦解。
description.en: A large-scale crackdown triggered by the discovery of a communist publication, the Guangming Daily, leading to the first major collapse of the CCP organization in Taiwan.

nodes.id: 中国共产党台湾省工作委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党台湾省工作委员会
en: Taiwan Provincial Work Committee of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在台湾的地下组织，在白色恐怖时期成为被镇压的主要目标之一。
description.en: The underground organization of the Chinese Communist Party in Taiwan, which became a primary target of suppression during the White Terror.

description.zh-cn: 时任基隆中学校长，因《光明报》事件被捕并枪决。
description.en: Then-principal of Keelung High School, arrested and executed in connection with the Guangming Daily Incident.

description.zh-cn: 法务部调查局进入清华大学逮捕学生，引发社会剧烈反弹，并直接促成立法院废除《惩治叛乱条例》。
description.en: The Ministry of Justice Investigation Bureau's arrest of a student at Tsing Hua University sparked intense social backlash and directly led to the Legislative Yuan's abolition of the Act for the Punishment of Rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 国立清华大学历史研究所硕士生，在“独立台湾会事件”中被调查局拘提，引发社会抗议。
description.en: A master's student at National Tsing Hua University's Institute of History, whose arrest by the Investigation Bureau in the "Independent Taiwan Association Incident" triggered social protests.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的司法调查机关，在白色恐怖后期依然扮演执行政治侦防的角色。
description.en: The judicial investigation agency of the Republic of China, which continued to play a role in political investigation and prevention in the later stages of the White Terror.

description.zh-cn: 依据《促进转型正义条例》成立的独立机关，负责推动转型正义，包括对白色恐怖时期的不法判决进行平反。
description.en: An independent commission established under the Act on Promoting Transitional Justice, responsible for advancing transitional justice, including overturning unjust verdicts from the White Terror period.

description.zh-cn: 为处理威权统治时期违反自由民主宪政秩序之不法行为与结果而制定的法律，是成立促进转型正义委员会的法律依据。
description.en: A law enacted to address illegal acts and consequences from the authoritarian period that violated the free and democratic constitutional order, serving as the legal basis for the establishment of the Transitional Justice Commission.

description.zh-cn: 由中国国民党主政的中华民国政府是白色恐怖的执行者，利用公权力迫害异议人士。
description.en: The KMT-led government of the Republic of China was the perpetrator of the White Terror, using state power to persecute dissidents.

description.zh-cn: 作为执政党，中国国民党主导了白色恐怖时期的威权统治。
description.en: As the ruling party, the Kuomintang led the authoritarian rule during the White Terror period.

description.zh-cn: 作为主要情治单位，负责执行戒严与政治肃清。
description.en: As a primary intelligence agency, it was responsible for enforcing martial law and political purges.

relationships.source: 国民政府军事委员会调查统计局

description.zh-cn: 作为主要情治单位，参与执行政治肃清。
description.en: As a primary intelligence agency, it participated in carrying out political purges.

description.zh-cn: 该戒严令的实施标志着台湾白色恐怖时期的开始。
description.en: The implementation of this martial law order marked the beginning of Taiwan's White Terror period.

description.zh-cn: 此“特别刑法”成为政府整肃异己、进行政治迫害的法律工具，是白色恐怖的根源。
description.en: This "special criminal law" became a legal tool for the government to purge dissidents and carry out political persecution, and was a root cause of the White Terror.

relationships.source: 戡乱时期检肃匪谍条例

description.zh-cn: 此条例纵容情治单位介入所有人民的政治活动，其废止被视为白色恐怖时期的结束。
description.en: This statute allowed intelligence agencies to intervene in all political activities of the people, and its abolition is considered the end of the White Terror period.

description.zh-cn: 韩战爆发后，中华民国政府开始对叛乱犯采取更高压的政策，加剧了白色恐怖的程度。
description.en: After the outbreak of the Korean War, the government of the Republic of China began to adopt more repressive policies against rebels, intensifying the White Terror.

description.zh-cn: 在国际冷战及美国麦卡锡主义兴起的背景下，台湾的反共政策与白色恐怖得以实行。
description.en: Against the backdrop of the international Cold War and the rise of McCarthyism in the US, Taiwan's anti-communist policies and the White Terror were implemented.

description.zh-cn: 以台湾省政府主席兼台湾省警备总司令身份颁布《台湾省戒严令》。
description.en: Issued the Taiwan Province Martial Law Order in his capacity as Governor of Taiwan Province and Commander of the Taiwan Garrison Command.

description.zh-cn: 三读通过《惩治叛乱条例》。
description.en: Passed the Act for the Punishment of Rebellion after three readings.

description.zh-cn: 通过废除《惩治叛乱条例》。
description.en: Passed the abolition of the Act for the Punishment of Rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 在泰源事件处理公文中，以红字亲自批示枪决。
description.en: Personally approved the execution in red ink on the official documents for the handling of the Taiyuan Incident.

description.zh-cn: 在泰源事件处理公文中，以红字亲自批示枪决。
description.en: Personally approved the execution in red ink on the official documents for the handling of the Taiyuan Incident.

description.zh-cn: 在泰源事件处理公文中，以红字亲自批示枪决。
description.en: Personally approved the execution in red ink on the official documents for the handling of the Taiyuan Incident.

relationships.target: 中国共产党台湾省工作委员会

description.zh-cn: 事件曝光后，引发全省大搜捕，导致省工委面临第一次瓦解。
description.en: After the incident came to light, it triggered a province-wide crackdown, leading to the first collapse of the Provincial Work Committee.

description.zh-cn: 时任基隆中学校长钟浩东因本案被捕并于1950年遭枪决。
description.en: Chung Hao-tung, then principal of Keelung High School, was arrested in this case and executed in 1950.

description.zh-cn: 进入清华大学宿舍拘提历史研究所硕士生廖伟程，引发“独立台湾会事件”。
description.en: Entered Tsing Hua University dormitories to arrest history graduate student Liao Wei-cheng, triggering the "Independent Taiwan Association Incident".

description.zh-cn: 该事件引发的社会抗议要求“废除惩治叛乱条例”，直接促使立法院于5月17日通过废除该条例。
description.en: The social protests sparked by this incident, demanding the "abolition of the Act for the Punishment of Rebellion," directly prompted the Legislative Yuan to pass its abolition on May 17.

description.zh-cn: 三读通过《促进转型正义条例》。
description.en: Passed the Act on Promoting Transitional Justice after three readings.

description.zh-cn: 该条例是成立促进转型正义委员会的法律基础，委员会于2018年5月31日正式挂牌成立。
description.en: This act serves as the legal basis for the establishment of the Transitional Justice Commission, which was formally inaugurated on May 31, 2018.

description.zh-cn: 开始陆续公告撤销白色恐怖时期受难者之有罪判决，进行平反。
description.en: Began to announce the revocation of guilty verdicts of victims from the White Terror period, carrying out rehabilitation.
